channel.title: Fercious #728 join now!
channel.description:
[SIZE="5"]Ferocious[/SIZE] forums : www.ferocious.hostzi.com join now!
[SIZE="4"]"You are about to take journey out of this world.. forget the world around you, forget the people around you, you are entering.. Ferocious"[/SIZE]
Player Commands
[code] ::home ::commands ::players ::afk ::breakdance ::dardhouse ::abusehouse ::polypore ::dung ::jadinko ::revs ::rockcave ::wasteland (PvP) ::easts (PvP) ::bork ::kq ::ele ::jad ::corp ::train ::train2 ::brimhaven ::icefiends ::taverley ::soulwars ::cw ::pest ::duel ::nomad ::glacors ::qbd ::icewyrm ::junglewyrm ::wildywyrm ::rfd (recipe for disaster starting area) ::dslayer (dragon slayer starting area) Other teleports can be found at Mr Ex / Max at home. [/code]
Features
[code]Nex
23 working skills (started working on construction.)
Custom pets (since this cache has runespan creatures, i have made them as pets.)
Auras
Most minigames working
QBD
Fight kiln (started work on waves)
lottery
corporeal beast
chaos elemental
Glacors (they also drop armadyl shard which you can combine into orb > staff.)
Clan Wars (start on safe PK.)
polypore
jadinkos
Full godwars
Working XP lamps (you get them via bossing/skilling.)
Ancient Effigies
Full slayer tower
New Tabs look (recently added)
3 working quests (recipe for disaster, dragon slayer, Void stares back.)
And more. [/code]
